dublin_core.dcvalue: Dr. Sania Nishtar, Founder, Heartfile, Email: sania@heartfile.org, Tel: +92-51-8358968

Heartfile Financing is an mHealth-enabled fund-based purchasing system which aligns service providers, patients, and donors in order to provide financial assistance to patients with non-communicable diseases.
